title: Can I get in touch with the rioters who work on the game client?
body:
Can I get in touch with the rioters who work on the game client? I'd like to pitch them one of my videos for the in game client stuff. Think it could be helpful :)

I've had a video in there once before if it helps.

replies.body:
Well, you got my attention that's for sure xD!

I love hearing players new ideas, especially when they're so passionate about wanting to help. I can try to pass along the information if you'd like, or you're free to post it over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) to get more visibility there as well!

Thanks! I've been doing some coaching for free for a while now and I noticed a common theme where people feel a bit lost on what to do in game at  any given time. I made a video recently on how to close out a game to victory that I think would be of benefit to the people who play the game. Would it be possible to have this featured in the client?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U3bYP4QG4Q8


For reference purposes I've had a video in the client before about 2 years ago so there must be a few folks over there who think my content is helpful I'm thinking.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/tips-tricks/claiyREp-the-climb-how-to-avoid-ganks-by-reading-your-opponent-commando-yi?show=new

Sorry for the wait bud! 

I've been trying my best to reach out the RiotOpti (the guy who featured you in his official post!) but I'm having a biiiiiit of a hard time tracking him down. I don't want that to stop you though! I'll do my best to keep my ears out for who could help, but let's go ahead and have you shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with this info, that way we can keep corresponding with you there!
